lore: Many theorize that, after his resounding failure, Dragan could not bear the shame and decided to move to a different continent. A short time later, the Council of Omnia announced to its people that Cerys, their beloved ruler, had died of a broken heart.\n\nAlthough they can erase anything, Voidlords prefer intelligent, living beings. Only Vampiric Voidlords possess the ability to control the speed at which they erase their target from the universe. When their fangs sink into flesh, their victim disappears slowly as the nothingness spreads from their feet until they simply cease to be.
menagerieDialog: (You'll probably never get accustomed to being around this creature. Something about its demeanor gives you goosebumps.)
(You'll probably never be able to fully trust that this creature won't stab you in the back when you least expect it.)
(It can take on any shape it wants, and yet it seems to stubbornly maintain this one at all times.)
(You should really consider keeping this creature somewhere else. It frightens your citizens with its grim demeanor.)
(It watches you intently, waiting for your next command.)
name: Vampiric Voidlord
